jd: From: Khursheed, RHG responseph@resourcehuntgroup.com Reply to: responseph@resourcehuntgroup.com Hi All,Hope you are doing great.Job Title : Java DeveloperLocation : New York City, NYDuration : ContractNote : Need Local to NY CandidatesLook 12+ years of experience candidates Job Description :Minimum of five years of JAVA development experience is required This JAVA Developer must have the following skills and experience in JAVA application development:• 4 years of experience with writing application software, data analysis, data access, data structures, data manipulation, databases, design, programming, testing and implementation, technical and user documentation, software conversions; available to assist and/or lead in the design of program specifications and the implementation of software solutions• Specific expertise in programming in the UI development, WEB environment utilizing JAVA, Angular, Micro Services, APIs, Java Script, Java Server Pages, SQL, web services.• Experience using JDeveloper.• A minimum of 4 years Java programming experience with in-depth knowledge of web technologies.• A minimum of 1 years' experience working with Web-logic and or Apache Tomcat.• A minimum of 1 year backend experience with SQL, Stored Procedures/Functions.• Minimum of 4 years' experience in the design, development, programming, and implementation of IT applications utilizing relational databases.• Experience in creation of design documents.• Quick to learn, self-motivated, and enthusiastic, work well within a team environment and with minimal supervision.• Comfortable working with clearly defined project plans and contributing estimates to the planning process.• Able to meet and deliver on deadlines and work well under pressureThanks & Regards,Khursheed
